title: I didn't get to play the tutorial
body: I am new to LOL and when I first made my account it didn't let me play the tutorial. So now I can't play at all. Can anyone help?

replies.body:
That's strange!  Upon your first login, did you receive an option to select your experience with Mobas?  No worries, you can still do the tutorial!  

Select Play on the top left of the client, then Training.  You should see the Tutorial there.  Here is a [screenshot ](http://i.imgur.com/xE9Z7e6.png)to help!

Welcome to League!  Let us know if you have any questions.  :D
